page.title: 09Legal Administration
page.content: Justice is administered on a rota basis at Forfar and Arbroath{Sheriff {Courts,}which deal with serious offences such as assaults, thefts and traffic violations. Less serious offences are dealt with by the{District Court}in Brechin, which is staffed by lay Justices of the Peace.This court deals with minor offences such as drunkeness and breach of the peace. Children under the age of 16 who commit offences are dealt with by the {Children's Panel}which meets regularly at Arbroath. Traffic Regulations are enforced by{ {Traffic Wardens.}
